item.title: Bracketology: Kentucky is biggest winner as upsets shake up top 16
item.description: The new year has brought some big upsets, a shake-up of the top 16 seeds and a new-look Bracketology.

item.title: AP Top 25 poll reaction: What to know about every team
item.description: The new women's AP Top 25 poll is out. Here's what's next for every team in the standings.

item.title: Ranking the top American tennis players as 2026 begins
item.description: Coco Gauff won another major title in 2025, and Taylor Fritz continued to lead the American men. But who else is set to make a move in 2026?

item.title: Why Matthew Stafford's command of the huddle gives Rams an edge
item.description: Ahead of Saturday's playoff game, the Rams quarterback's demeanor and football IQ renders him a unique signal-caller.

item.title: 'Fragile' no more: How the Bears' Caleb Williams, Ben Johnson evolved
item.description: Williams thought Johnson didn't like him at one point, but the duo evolved to lead the playoff-bound Bears.
